title: Turkey launches attack in Syria, protests in Quito, power out in California: The Week in Pictures
text:
ABC News photo editors chose the best news images of the week for this collection. </br></br>A Paris Opera Ballet dancer performs at the at the Musee d'Orsay in Paris, Oct. 9, 2019. Martin Bureau/AFP/Getty Images

A riot police vehicle confronts anti-government protesters in Quito, Ecuador, Oct. 7, 2019. Carlos Garcia Rawlins/Reuters

People run as mortars are fired from Syria, in Akcakale, Turkey, Oct. 10, 2019. Ismail Coskun/HA via AP

Soldiers march during the Indian Air Force Day celebrations on the outskirts of New Delhi, Oct. 8, 2019. Anushree Fadnavis/Reuters

Japan's Kosuke Matsui prepares to compete at the Swimming World Cup in Budapest, Hungary, Oct. 6, 2019. Tamas Kovacs/EPA via Shutterstock

A truck makes a delivery during a power outage in Sonoma, Calif., Oct. 9, 2019. Power was shut off due to the high risk of fires. Noah Berger/AP

A child participates in the Extinction Rebellion protest on Cocacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, Oct. 7, 2019. Sergio Moraes/Reuters

NYPD Officer Arvid Flores and his children join in the funeral mass in Monroe, New York, Oct. 4, 2019, for NYPD Officer Brian Mulkeen, who was killed by friendly fire. Spencer Platt/Getty Images

People leave flowers at the synagogue following an attack in Halle, Germany, Oct. 19, 2019. Fabrizio Bensch/Reuters

A security guard looks at a mobile phone at an event at Gyeongbokgung Palace in Seoul, South Korea, Oct. 4, 2019. Ed Jones/AFP/Getty Images

Police check a student at a rally to mark Taiwanï¿½s National Day in Hong Kong, Oct. 10, 2019. Philip Fong/AFP/Getty Images

A dog waits to be judged during a competition in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan, Oct. 5, 2019. Igor Kovalenko/EPA via Shutterstock
description: Find this week's top photos from around the globe in ABC News' This Week in Pictures slideshow
